tools.name: SVG API
tools.description: Rest API to search and list wide variety of icons. Build awesome stuff with free and maker-friendly pricing points.

tools.name: Open Design License
tools.description: Open Design is accessible to anyone who is able to get, use, change, and share it, as long as it is kept track of, not redistributed in the same way

tools.name: SVG Find
tools.description: Explore our vast vector library and find the perfect icons or vectors for your projects. Edit them to your desire and download them.

tools.name: Vector Mixer
tools.description: A vector mixing application that has tools to customize attributes such as size, color, background, and other characteristics of a vectors

tools.name: SVG Vector Editor
tools.description: A vector editor tool, that allows you to change properties like size, color, background, and other attributes of a vector images.

tools.name: Text2Icon
tools.description: text2icon is an AI web app that generates icons based on given text in black and white color palette, and allows you to download SVG.

tools.name: Carbon Neutral Website
tools.description: A carbon emission calculator that takes into account the power consumption of device and server during browsing a web page.

tools.name: VectorMaker
tools.description: Convert images to SVG vectors, PNG-to-SVG Vectors. Vectormaker outlines your pixel based images and turns them into colored SVG vector files.
